title: Information germ theory
description: You walk into the doctor with a cold. They prescribe an X-ray. You walk in with a headache. X-ray. Need glasses? X-ray. Depressed? X-ray. Imagine every time you went to the doctor, no matter what was wrong, you got the same treatment — and most times, it did nothing. Or worse, it caused more harm....
